author: Andrew Orr
title: Facebook Credit Card Scam Exposed via Data Leak
description:
A phishing and credit card fraud operation has been targeting Facebook users and was recently uncovered due to an exposed database.
The fraudsters used the stolen login credentials to share spam comments on Facebook posts via the victims hacked account, direc…
